mapper.select: select * from reservation_avail where space_no = #{ spaceNo }
mapper.insert: insert into reservation_avail values ( #{ day }, #{ spaceNo }, #{ startHour }, #{ endHour } )
insert into reservation values ( 'REV'||seq_rev_no.nextval, #{ memberEmail }, #{ spaceNo }, sysdate, #{ dDay }, #{ startHour }, #{ endHour }, #{ totalPrice }, default, default, #{ pay } )
mapper.select: select * from reservation where member_email = #{ email } order by rev_date desc
